datasets.name: CIFAR-10
datasets.description: A dataset of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class.

datasets.name: ImageNet
datasets.description: A large visual database designed for use in visual object recognition software research.

datasets.name: MNIST
datasets.description: A dataset of handwritten digits, consisting of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images.

datasets.name: COCO
datasets.description: Common Objects in Context, a large-scale object detection, segmentation, and captioning dataset.

datasets.name: Open Images
datasets.description: A dataset of ~9 million images annotated with image-level labels and object bounding boxes.
